title: Ticket #6290: condor_init is not documented
description: I found code using condor_init but there is no man page and I did not find it in the condor manual. It is a script, so at the end I looked at the code. Still would be nice to have it mentioned in the manual.
remarks:
2018-Jun-28 16:26:37 by jfrey:
I plan to remove condor_init entirely (#3875).
